r.s: The source code for the PEAR website
r.d:
The pearweb package contains: - cron jobs for the website in cron/ - off-public web files in include - public web files - the PEAR bug tracker public_html/bugs - the PEPr proposal system public_html/pepr - sql defining the database and an MDB2_Schema files - a few regression tests - templates
See the pearweb_phars package for install-pear-nozlib.phar/go-pear.phar See the pearweb_channelxml package for channel.xml See the pearweb_index package for regularly changed content files like index.php
r.n:
This version brings major usability enhancements to the patch tracker. It also makes most of pearweb XHTML valid.
